Satisfied Clients

With over 25 years of ICT experience, Akiko Sherman Infotech Pvt. Ltd. has developed 800+ eGovernance solutions for government departments and public sector entities, aligning with the Digital India mission. Pioneering the government digital space, our team of professionals collaborates with ministries to enhance solutions for better citizen engagement. Amidst the evolving ICT landscape, we prioritize innovation and strive to make a difference for every client, ensuring secure and reliable services in line with the nation's digital transformation.

Key Projects

LAND ACQUISITION

The National Portal automates land acquisition for MoRTH, NHAI, and NHIDCL with separate workflows, OTP-based security, and DSC approval. It supports e-Gazette file uploads, real-time email/SMS alerts, and PFMS integration for seamless financial management.

Learn More
INFRACON

The National Portal enables one-click evaluation of infrastructure consultancy firms and key personnel for projects, involving MoRTH and state PWDs. It supports online registration, profile updates, and collaboration, ensuring efficient evaluation and engagement.

Learn More
TAMRA

A National Project developed for the Ministry of Mines to monitor the allocation of mining blocks to preferred bidders. It tracks the progress of various statutory clearances and provides real-time updates, ensuring transparency, accountability, and timely execution of mining-related projects.

Learn More
OWC

The portal facilitates cargo movement approvals on National and State Highways for Over Dimensional and Overweight Vehicles. It allows transporters to input trip details, plot routes, pay fees, and enables regional offices to review and approve requests efficiently.

Learn More
FARM2PLATE

A Digital AgriTech solution that addresses key supply chain challenges in the food and perishables sector. It connects farmers, suppliers, transporters, and retailers on a single platform, offering traceability, real-time updates, and improved logistics, ensuring efficient farm-to-fork delivery and reduced post-harvest losses.

Learn More
NOC

The Access and Utility Permission Portal streamlines approvals for industrial and public utilities along National Highways. It allows the public to apply for access, track applications, and respond to queries while providing a workflow-based interface for Highway Administration Offices.

Learn More
BRO

The BRO Job Monitoring System enables BRO and stakeholders to track job progress through a structured workflow. It supports project-level job definitions, RCC-level execution entries, master data management, user hierarchy, scheme-wise targets, and detailed road mapping.

Learn More
DEFENCE EXIM

The Defence Exim Portal streamlines NOC processing for military goods export and import. It supports online registration, application submission, and workflow-based approvals, generating digitally signed permission letters via DSC for secure and efficient processing.

Learn More
SMART METERING

A specialized digital solution for real-time water usage monitoring and automated billing. Designed to support the "Har Ghar Jal" mission, it ensures efficient water resource management by tracking consumption, detecting anomalies, and enabling accurate, timely collection of water bills from households.

Learn More
E-PAUTI

E-Pauti is Odisha’s digital land revenue payment system, enabling citizens to pay dues online securely. It reduces the need for in-person visits, enhances convenience, and streamlines government operations through digital receipts, payment tracking, and integration with treasury systems.

Learn More
BHULEKH

BHULEKH offers Odisha citizens digital access to land records through a transparent, user-friendly platform. It supports online viewing and downloading of land details, promotes accountability, and simplifies transactions, reducing the need for manual processes and enhancing governance in land management.

Learn More
LITIGATION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

Odisha’s Litigation Management System digitizes the tracking of legal cases across departments. It captures case details, deadlines, and updates, improving legal coordination, oversight, and efficiency. The system ensures timely interventions and minimizes delays in legal proceedings with centralized data access.

Learn More
HRMS

An Integrated Human Resource Management System implemented in Odisha to streamline workforce administration. It handles employee records, payroll, attendance, and other HR functions digitally. The platform enhances transparency, ensures timely service delivery, and supports efficient decision-making in government workforce management.

Learn More
VAHAN

A Comprehensive vehicle registration platform that automates major RTO functions like new registrations, ownership transfers, tax payments, permits, fitness certifications, and challan settlements. It ensures compliance with Central and State Motor Vehicle Regulations, simplifying workflows for transport departments and improving service delivery nationwide.

Learn More
